Articles.Content:
Hi modders,

if you have ever wanted to have some sensor parts but you don't have the time and/or knowledge to made some from scratch, this is some to help you.

You'll never miss a resource anymore !

It contains a rotating dish antenna and two hawkeye style sensors.

Everything needed to do your own sensor in 3d point of view, if I might say, is there.

Please take a look at included documentation for details.

sensors pack 1 -> download

templates in photoshop format for people who need them -> download

(contact me if links are dead)

Pictures of included parts:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Released under the Whatever license 1.0 (see inside license file for more info).

Edited March 1, 2014 by Justin Kerbice
fix album link (twice :) )

Great job, one suggestion.

When you present an imgur album drop everything the # and everything after it so it scales right in the forums.

An imgur link is linked like this [ imgur] xxxxxx [/ imgur]

(No spaces)

Edited March 1, 2014 by Hodo

double post

Edited March 1, 2014 by Hodo
double post

Great job, one suggestion.

When you present an imgur album drop everything the # and everything after it so it scales right in the forums.

An imgur link is linked like this [ imgur] xxxxxx [/ imgur]

(No spaces)

Thanks I didn't notice this evil # .

Why is this for modders only?

Because the parts by themselves have no purpose at all and they are not carefully balanced (mass especially as FS needs lightweight parts)
